title: Storm Grey
description: Briley the witch and Smokey are back!Beware of the grey...A storm is coming, threatening to bring death and destruction to the village of Maepole. Ghroda the forest spirit knows it, and young witch Briley has witnessed its terrifying effects during a vision.Fraught with worry and unable to convince the villagers, only her talking cat Smokey and the new man in her life Jorin believes her.But for whatever reason, Ghroda is not concerned about the storm, gives Briley a stark warning:Beware of the grey... it comes for you...At first Briley is confused and bewildered.Until a group of strange warriors from the far north arrive at the village, all heavily armed, all dressed in grey...
author: Sarah Jane Avory
